margaritas.name: Classic Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and a slice of lime for garnish
margaritas.directions: Combine the tequila, cointreau, lime juice and simple syrup in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake until cold, and strain into a chilled, salt-rimmed rocks glass. Garnish with lime, and serve.

margaritas.name: Blue Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and a slice of lime for garnish
margaritas.directions: Combine the tequila, Blue Curacao and lime juice in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake until cold, and strain into a chilled, salt-rimmed rocks glass. Garnish with lime, and serve.

margaritas.name: Strawberry Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and a fresh strawberry for garnish
margaritas.directions: Combine the tequila, Triple Sec, Strawberry Schnaps, lemon juice and strawberries in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake until cold, and strain into a chilled, salt-rimmed rocks glass. Garnish a strawberry, and serve.

margaritas.name: Smashed Watermelon Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and a slice of watermelon for garnish
margaritas.directions: In a mason jar muddle the watermelon and 5 mint leaves together into a puree and strain. Next add the grapefruit juice, juice of half a lime and the tequila as well as some ice. Put a lid on the jar and shake. Pour into a glass and add more ice. Garnish with fresh mint and a small slice of watermelon.

margaritas.name: Cucumber Jalapeño Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and slices of lime for garnish
margaritas.directions: In a cocktail shaker, add cucumber slices, lime slices, lime juice, jalapeno slices, and sugar and muddle together. Add tequila and Cointreau and fill with ice. Shake until cold, and strain into a chilled, salt-rimmed rocks glass. Garnish with cucumber and serve.

margaritas.name: Mango Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and a slice of lime for garnish
margaritas.directions: Add the tequila, Cointreau, lime juice, frozen mango, simple syrup and ice to a blender. Blend until frothy and fully combined strain into a chilled, salt-rimmed rocks glass. Garnish with lime, and serve.

margaritas.name: Basil Lime Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and a slice of lime for garnish
margaritas.directions: Combine the tequila, lime juice, simple syrup and basil leaves in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake until cold, and strain into a chilled, salt-rimmed rocks glass. Garnish with lime, basil leaves, and serve.

margaritas.name: Ginger Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and sliced lime ginger for garnish
margaritas.directions: To make Honey syrup, combine equal parts of honey and warm water, stirring until honey dissolves. Muddle the 2 ginger slices with the honey syrup in a coctail shaker. Add the tequila, lime juice and ice. Shake until cold, then strain into a chilled, salt-rimmed rocks glass. Garnish with lime a slice of ginger, and serve.
